item.title: Mobile bike repair unit resurfaced, 9th September
item.description:
The informal mobile motorcycle repair unit has resurfaced in its usual pitch area, outside the allotment gardens. Noise pollution very unpleasant for locals neighbourhood and residents. No parking available for residents or visitors.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fielding Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree fallen across footpath, 9th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glassmill Lane, Shortlands, London

item.title: Clear broken glass still down centre of street, 9th September
item.description:
Thanks for having edges of liverpool grove swept, but the clear broken glass remains down the centre of the street - mostly in front of the seat facing the church (outside 6 Malvern house, but spreads as far as 1 Malvern House. Grateful if it can be swept up properly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Liverpool Grove, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet
